Name: Shiny Charm
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Chikorita, Bayleef, and Meganium.  Swap a Megani-Claw and a Megani-Card for a Shiny Charm at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
